00093 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00094  * Classes
00095  */
00096 
00101 class c_string_sink
00102 {
00103 public:
00105     typedef c_string_sink       class_type;
00107     typedef ff_char_t           char_type;
00109     typedef size_t              size_type;
00110 
00111 public:
00113     c_string_sink(size_type n, char_type* buffer)
00114         : m_capacity(n)
00115         , m_len(0)
00116         , m_buffer(buffer)
00117     {}
00118 #ifdef STLSOFT_CF_STATIC_ARRAY_SIZE_DETERMINATION_SUPPORT
00120     template <size_t N>
00121     c_string_sink(char_type (&ar)[N])
00122         : m_capacity(N)
00123         , m_len(0)
00124         , m_buffer(&ar[0])
00125     {}
00126 #endif /* STLSOFT_CF_STATIC_ARRAY_SIZE_DETERMINATION_SUPPORT */
00127 
00128 public: // Attributes
00130     size_type size() const
00131     {
00132         return m_len;
00133     }
00135     size_type capacity() const
00136     {
00137         return m_capacity;
00138     }
00139 
00140 public: // Operations
00142     class_type& write(size_type cchTotal, size_type numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results, int flags)
00143     {
00144         const ff_string_slice_t crlf            =   fastformat_getNewlineForPlatform();
00145 
00146         const size_type         requiredSize    =   size()
00147                                                     +   cchTotal
00148                                                     +   ((flags::ff_newLine & flags) ? crlf.len : 0)
00149                                                     +   1
00150                                                     ;
00151 
00152         if(requiredSize > capacity())
00153         {
00154             throw std::out_of_range("character buffer sink capacity exceeded");
00155         }
00156         else
00157         {
00158             char_type* p = &m_buffer[0] + size();
00159 
00160             // next we concatenate all the slices
00161 
00162             { for(size_type i = 0; i < numResults; ++i)
00163             {
00164                 ff_string_slice_t const& slice = results[i];
00165 
00166                 ::memcpy(p, slice.ptr, slice.len * sizeof(char_type));
00167                 p += slice.len;
00168             }}
00169 
00170             // then append the new line, if required
00171 
00172             if(flags::ff_newLine & flags)
00173             {
00174                 const ff_string_slice_t crlf = fastformat_getNewlineForPlatform();
00175 
00176                 ::memcpy(p, crlf.ptr, crlf.len * sizeof(char_type));
00177                 p += crlf.len;
00178             }
00179 
00180             *p++ = '\0';
00181 
00182             m_len += cchTotal;
00183 
00184             FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_POSTCONDITION_STATE_APPL_LAYER(p == &m_buffer[0] + size() + 1, "c_string sink writing logic failed: write pointer in wrong place");
00185         }
00186 
00187         return *this;
00188     }
00189 
00190 private: // Member variables
00191     const size_type     m_capacity;
00192     size_t              m_len;
00193     char_type* const    m_buffer;
00194 
00195 private: // Not to be implemented
00196     c_string_sink(class_type const&);
00197     class_type& operator =(class_type const&);
00198 };
00199 
00200 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00201  * Action Shims
00202  */
00203 
00207 inline c_string_sink& fmt_slices(c_string_sink& sink, int flags, size_t cchTotal, size_t numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results)
00208 {
00209     return sink.write(cchTotal, numResults, results, flags);
00210 }
